text:
In this case, where the URI has a fragment index only (#f), initialzeScheme()
method shouldn't be called (since it does't have a scheme) which is being done
in the code. Hence the error. So a check for the fragmentIndex is required. A
similar error occurs when one gives a URI with just a query string (?q).

Fixed in both Xerces-J and Xerces2-J.
Thanks to the patchs from Henry Zongaro and Pavani Mukthipudi.
